changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO NOMENCLATOR_VALUES (ID, NOMENCLATOR_ID, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, DELETED) VALUES (nextval('HIBERNATE_SEQUENCE'), (select ID from nomenclator where code='registru_iesiri_tip_document'), 'CJ', 'Contract juridic', FALSE);
